subject: Golf
Women
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Nicole Castrale, who finished tied for sixth at last month’s United States Women’s Open, is asked for advice by amateur male and female golfers when she accompanies them in pro-am events.
snippet: Nicole Castrale, who finished tied for sixth at last month’s United States Women’s Open, is asked for advice by amateur male and female golfers when she accompanies them in pro-am events.
